bill.summary:
Common Sense Credit Union Capital Relief Act of 2017
This bill nullifies the National Credit Union Administration rule titled "Risk-Based Capital" published on October 29, 2015. (The rule establishes a new method, beginning in 2019, for measuring whether a credit union is adequately capitalized.)
